subject: Soccer
UEFA European Football Championship
lead_paragraph: Petr Jiracek scored a second-half goal as the Czech Republic knocked Poland out of the European championships. The Czechs earned a spot in the quarterfinals by finishing at the top of Group A.
snippet: Petr Jiracek scored a second-half goal as the Czech Republic knocked Poland out of the European championships. The Czechs earned a spot in the quarterfinals by finishing at the top of Group A.
